content.text: Looks like last night was a bit of a rollercoaster in dreamland. Today, take it easy, maybe sneak in a power nap, and consider winding down earlier tonight with some soothing music or a good book.
Your heart rate was a bit of a bumpy ride last night, which might indicate some stress or disturbances. Try some relaxation techniques before bed tonight, like deep breathing or meditation.
You didn’t hit your sleep quota last night. Let’s aim for a full 7-8 hours tonight to help you feel more refreshed and ready to tackle the day.
You’re already a star for choosing premium! Keep shining bright and making the most of your Welltory insights.
